metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16881 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in rsyslog in the imptcp module. An attacker could send a specially crafted message to the imptcp socket, which would cause rsyslog to crash. Versions before 8.27.0 are vulnerable.

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires imptcp module to be loaded, which is not enabled in the default configuration

criterions.comment: rsyslog: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
